trans-unit.source: Compress and resize images with TinyPng

Here you can compress images with the TinyPng-Service. You can also add a width or/and a height to resize the images. There are some Settings in the Settings-Screen! To use the TinyPNG-Service you need to generate a free or commercial API-Key!
Here you can see an overview over the images the Meta-Data and the Meta-Data of the Images used in the Content-Elements!
Compares images with the help of imagick and shows how different the images are.
Here are the settings for the screen!
